activity.title: openfoodfacts/hunger-games#1105
activity.text:
> Is there any point creating a GitHub action to automate the refresh @alexfauquette ?

I don't think it's needed This PR was an exploration. I just keep it to easily go back on the API/data I used. But as it is now it's too crappy to be merged

activity.title: openfoodfacts/hunger-games#1174
activity.text:
I assume this is an autogenerated PR from some LLM.

- limiting language to a white list... it's boring, and the only thing it brings is preventing users from accessing their locale if we forget one.
- `const barcodeRegex = /^[0-9A-Za-z]+$/;` I thaught barcode was only made of digits O:)

open_prs.title: Link to Producer platform not visible on small screen
Nutrition: Adapt values to units
Create Taxo-walk the game to navigate the taxonomy
[nutrition] Allow to add nutriments
Make country and language two general states
Logo search does not support the `taxonomy_value` field
Brand not found with fr language
Document the list of taxonomy names
Search request returns an empty array when done on world
Coherent default values and steps
Autosuggestion: Encourage users to discover and improve the taxonomy
[quality] Avoid annotating scan errors
Distinguish product edited and annotations
Add integration with openfoodfacts-events to display your user stats
Validate answers in the buffer when quitting the page
Use Robotoff to prefill some nutrition fields
Create a controllable Nutrition table
Nutrition Game (Tracker)
When the product change, the window scroll to the top as if it was a new page
On a desktop the picture is on the left for nutrition game
